text: The Country Doctor is a 1927 silent film directed by Rupert Julian and starring Rudolph Schildkraut. It was produced by Cecil B. DeMille and distributed by Pathé Exchange.The Country Doctor at silentera.com The AFI Catalog of Feature Films 1893-1993:The Country DoctorPictorial History of the Silent Screen, p.307 c.1953 by Daniel Blum; Putnam and Sons ==Cast== *Rudolph Schildkraut - Dr. Amos Rinker *Frank Coghlan Jr. - Sard Jones *Sam De Grasse - Ira Harding *Virginia Bradford - Opal Jones *Gladys Brockwell - Myra Jones *Frank J. Marion - Joe Harding *Jane Keckley - Abbie Harding *Louis Natheaux - Sidney Fall *Ethel Wales - Redora Bump *Carmencita Johnson - Baby (*uncredited) ==Preservation status== *Copies are held by several US and Euro archives. The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:The Country Doctor ==References== ==External links== * * *lobby poster(archived) *lobby poster(archived) Category:1927 films Category:American silent feature films Category:American films Category:Films directed by Rupert Julian Category:American black-and-white films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:English-language films
title: The Country Doctor (1927 film)
